description: Application to vary condition 1 of planning permission Ref: DM2024/01429 for the 'Erection of a part one, part two storey side extension, conversion of loft space, removal of a flank chimney and rooflight, alterations to a ground floor flank and first floor rear fenestration, alterations to rear patio and rear and rear/flank landscaping', to allow for alteration to front elevation and fenestrations.
